08140eaa-f360-4aa2-a25f-106f92bf91b6.description: Earners of this credential have evolved their entrepreneurial skills by successfully completing the Learn & Inspire programme by ASPIRE/Rainmaking and ACEA. They are able to understand problem led approach to ideating new business ideas and explore different creative solutions to solving them. They can clearly communicate their idea, evidencing their approach and with the appropriate business model. There was particular focus on Digital Innovation, ESG and Smart Human Organisations.
08140eaa-f360-4aa2-a25f-106f92bf91b6.name: Learn & Inspire

issuer.summary: issued by ASPIRE - Rainmaking Innovation Ltd

badge_template_activities.title: Understanding the importance of problematic thinking when generating ideas
Developing knowledge around the lean startup framework, Customer & Business Model Canvas tools
Applying skills to translate data into insights, and identifying risky assumptions
Communicating clearly the problem the idea is trying to solve
Evaluating the strength of your customer segment

761126de-6efb-47ee-88b2-76c8798ff776.description: Earners of this credential, leaders within large organisations, have been equipped with the skills and tools to design and develop an innovation strategy by completing ASPIRE's Elevate programme. Graduates understand how to support a portfolio approach to innovation, fund their innovation activity & how to build critical new capability inside their organisation enabling them to encourage their business unit to identify and bring new ideas to market faster & successfully scale them.
761126de-6efb-47ee-88b2-76c8798ff776.name: Elevate

issuer.summary: issued by ASPIRE - Rainmaking Innovation Ltd

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates can appropriately use VC frameworks to identify disruption and understand the application of this approach to develop an innovation growth strategy
Graduates have built and can justify an innovation thesis enabling them to create a portfolio approach for their innovation strategy.
Graduates have learnt and understood 5 different approaches to funding innovation, and able to evaluate each approach as and when appropriate for application in their business.

Graduates are able to understand different approaches to governing innovation activity, what measures need to be in place and understand the processes required. They can set metrics and measure impact of their innovation strategy
Graduates understand the importance of building a culture to foster innovation.
Graduates are able to identify talent and capability gaps, plus have an understanding of how they will engage the enabling teams like HR, legal & IT to enable faster innovation

da414ab7-1a7a-4726-9ba2-45f7c3f94e1d.description: Earners of this credential have evolved their entrepreneurial skills by successfully completing the 20 weeks Evolve Launch innovation programme by ASPIRE. Graduates have developed a commercially viable new business solution, addressing specific market need. They understand and have tested pricing, financial modeling, marketing, sales & team building. They have developed a roadmap for their next phase of the solution development and a pitch that can clearly communicate the opportunity.
da414ab7-1a7a-4726-9ba2-45f7c3f94e1d.name: Evolve Launch

issuer.summary: issued by ASPIRE - Rainmaking Innovation Ltd

badge_template_activities.title: Understanding how to identify, evaluate, develop and launch new commercially viable innovation or solutions/products, by starting to understand your customer needs.
Developing skills around testing, experimenting and rapid prototyping with minimum efforts using low-code no code techniques.
Applying skills to build business & financial models and sales & marketing strategy for launch and succesfully pitching the new business, innovation
Identifying skills required to build the business. Communicating and engaging their team through a clear roadmap for launch and growth.
Evaluating your new solution by ensuring it is desirable, feasible and commercially viable using all the lean startup tools and frameworks

4f2c688b-50f2-45a8-87d1-d88c648cc83c.description: Earners of this credential have evolved their entrepreneurial skills by successfully completing the Customer Discovery innovation programme by ASPIRE. They are able to understand customers' needs by using their inquisitive nature to unlock the pains or gains of different propositions, identifying the best solution for their needs. They have developed a sound understanding of lean startup principles and the Build-Measure-Learn cycle and are adept at building further insights.
4f2c688b-50f2-45a8-87d1-d88c648cc83c.name: Evolve Customer Discovery

issuer.summary: issued by ASPIRE - Rainmaking Innovation Ltd

badge_template_activities.title: Understanding why customer discovery is important in building new solutions and businesses. Applying the tools introduced to do it successfully.
Developing a deep understanding of your customer segment and their needs
Applying your skills to build and update your customer canvas and business model canvas
Communicating and doing research with your potential customer in a non-directive way
Evaluating your results through the build-learn-measure cycle and lean start-up approach and the problem-market-fit lense

bfe21b0b-c6e3-4eed-a3d6-bf4d8506cd11.description: Earners of this credential have developed their skills to scaleup their business by successfully completing the Amplify programme by ASPIRE. They have taken a forensic approach to evaluating each pillar of their business to understand and apply best practice to prepare it for scale. They have identified key challenges that can come from this next stage of growth and how they can address them, ensuring they are set up for success. They have a detailed roadmap & understanding where to focus.
bfe21b0b-c6e3-4eed-a3d6-bf4d8506cd11.name: Evolve Amplify

issuer.summary: issued by ASPIRE - Rainmaking Innovation Ltd

badge_template_activities.title: Graduates have a clear understanding of each pillar of their business, improvements and efficiencies they need to make to ensure the business is set up for scale.
Graduates have created their roadmap for growth, recruitment plan, generating new & repeatable sales strategy & product development roadmap
Graduates have developed their investment readiness with a fund raising strategy, clarity on their investment ask, ROI for investors and use of funds.
Graduates understand the importance of managing a board and the different roles stakeholders play.
Graduates have developed a priority list of resources required by the business from skills to services and have a clear understanding of how they will build their team for this next stage

e8e4e055-775b-4f72-b925-6472553511b9.description: Earners of this credential have evolved their entrepreneurial skills by successfully completing the Prototype & Launch innovation programme by ASPIRE. They have developed an entrepreneurial mindset and are able to develop a new business solution, addressing specific market need. They understand rapid prototyping, financial modeling and can use customer conversations to inform pricing and develop a sales & marketing strategy, in order to pitch their new solutions/innovation.
e8e4e055-775b-4f72-b925-6472553511b9.name: Evolve Prototype & Launch

issuer.summary: issued by ASPIRE - Rainmaking Innovation Ltd

badge_template_activities.title: Understanding how to prototype and launch commercially viable solutions/products
Developing skills around testing, experimenting and rapid prototyping with minimum efforts using low-code no code techniques
Applying skills to build business & financial models and sales & marketing strategy for launch and succesfully pitching the new business
Understanding key skill gaps and resource requirements to develop the business or solution to its next stage of growth
Evaluating your new solution with the product-market-fit lense and getting it ready for launch with a developed roadmap and clear milestones

e510b926-dfd6-4f75-82a0-506610698ed3.description: Earners of this credential have evolved their entrepreneurial skills by successfully completing the Spark innovation programme by ASPIRE. They are able to understand problem lead approach to ideating new business ideas and explore different creative solutions to solving them. They can clearly communicate their idea, evidencing their approach using data insights and with the appropriate business model. They can map their idea to relevant customer segments, identifying any potential risks.
e510b926-dfd6-4f75-82a0-506610698ed3.name: Evolve Spark

issuer.summary: issued by ASPIRE - Rainmaking Innovation Ltd

badge_template_activities.title: Understanding the importance of problematic thinking when generating ideas
Developing knowledge around the lean startup framework, Customer & Business Model Canvas tools
Applying skills to translate data into insights, and identifying risky assumptions
Communicating clearly the problem the idea is trying to solve
Evaluating the strength of your customer segment
